pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Utilities Accompanying the Software Package BayesX // Functions for exploring and visualising estimation results obtained with BayesX, a free software for estimating structured additive regression models (https://www.uni- goettingen.de/de/bayesx/550513.html). In addition, functions that allow to read, write and manipulate map objects that are required in spatial analyses performed with BayesX.
